actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel "Western Surf".

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: A bill to authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel "Western Surf".
